item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction # Significance # Understanding the language of spices is a key to open a door to this world. A door that leads to the realization that our words—and material culture—are deeply interconnected, and that they have have been so for thousands of years. I will try to demonstrate this by introducing these fascinating substances from a new perspective, the perspective of language. It is trendy nowadays to talk about foodways, a term that refers to “the eating habits and culinary practices of people, regions, or historical periods”,1 and food history, a relatively young interdisciplinary academic field is starting to gain traction as well.
